tool_description: A rich API to get EuroMillions results. With this API you can consult the last result, submit the numbers of one or more bets and check how many numbers you hit. As it has a track record since 2004, you can even get statistics on the numbers that have been drawn the most, check if your lucky numbers have ever come out in previous draws or consult the results of a specific draw. For the most recent draws, you can find out how many bets matched the numbers and how much money each one received. ...
title: Euro Millions

api_list.name: Check a single bet
api_list.description: Submit the numbers of a bet and see how many numbers you hit according to the most recent result available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://euro-millions.p.rapidapi.com/results/bet"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "euro-millions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get the Last result
api_list.description: Get the latest draw results available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://euro-millions.p.rapidapi.com/results/lastresult"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "euro-millions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Check multiple bets
api_list.description: Submit multiple bets on a JSON object and get the analysis for each one

api_list.name: Get History bet
api_list.description: Submit a bet and see through the previous draws if the numbers for this bet were drawn
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://euro-millions.p.rapidapi.com/results/history/bet"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "euro-millions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: My best match
api_list.description: Find when a given bet had a best match result in the past draws since 2004. This is a summary of /results/history/bet endpoint, indicating only the best performance your bet had, when occurred, how many numbers, stars and more.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://euro-millions.p.rapidapi.com/results/summary/bet"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "euro-millions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All draws results
api_list.description: Get the results of all draws in history of EuroMillions since 2004

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all stats
api_list.description: Provide statistics about the frequency of each number in all draws in EuroMillions history in database. Here you can get the most frequent number or star in the draws.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://euro-millions.p.rapidapi.com/results/stat/all"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "euro-millions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get M1lhao
api_list.description: Get last drawn result of M1lhao (M1lhão (‘The Million’) is a supplementary game offered to Portuguese EuroMillions players which offers the chance to win a prize of €1 million on Friday evenings.)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://euro-millions.p.rapidapi.com/results/v2/milhao/lastresult"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "euro-millions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Birthday draws
api_list.description: Get all draws result occurred at a given birthday date (mm-dd) and check it out what's your lucky number and related statistics.

api_list.name: refresh_data
api_list.description: For admin use only

api_list.name: Get result by date
api_list.description: Get the draws result for an specific date

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date you want to check draws numbers
